MALEFICAR_MANOEUVRES.Settings.LogLevel.H: Set how chatty the module gets in the console. Debug and Trace levels will rabbit on for development work. Chuck it on "Off" to shut it up completely.
MALEFICAR_MANOEUVRES.Settings.TokenSnapE: When switched on, tokens will stick to each other like a joey to its mum when you drop 'em nearby.
MALEFICAR_MANOEUVRES.Settings.SnapDuring: When enabled, tokens will stick together during animated movements as well as dragging. Turn it off and they'll only snap when you're manually dragging the little blighters.
MALEFICAR_MANOEUVRES.Settings.Optimisati: Choose how hard you want to push the engine. Foundry Default keeps things stock standard without any fancy modifications.
Foundry Default - No Worries, Keep It Simple
Performance - She'll Be Right, Flat Out
Quality - Pretty as a Picture (Might Bog Down)
MALEFICAR_MANOEUVRES.Settings.ShowTokenB: Show the invisible lines around tokens so you can see what's what. Bonzer for debugging when tokens are playing up.
MALEFICAR_MANOEUVRES.Notifications.Modul: {title} is up and running! Token movement and rendering are now tickety-boo.
MALEFICAR_MANOEUVRES.Notifications.Initi: {title}: Crikey! Failed to get going - have a squiz at the console for details
MALEFICAR_MANOEUVRES.Notifications.Optim: Couldn't apply the performance settings - something's gone walkabout
MALEFICAR_MANOEUVRES.Notifications.Token: Token boundaries are now visible, mate
MALEFICAR_MANOEUVRES.Notifications.NoSna: Token drop blocked: That spot's already taken and no snapping happened.
MALEFICAR_MANOEUVRES.Notifications.MoveR: Movement cancelled: Bumped into another token, mate.
Movement cancelled: Token snapping went belly-up.
MALEFICAR_MANOEUVRES.Console.LoggerUpdat: Logger's been updated with new level: {level}
MALEFICAR_MANOEUVRES.Console.DebugEnable: Debug logging is now switched on, mate!
MALEFICAR_MANOEUVRES.Console.CreatingLog: Setting up Foundry logger with level: {levelName} ({level})
MALEFICAR_MANOEUVRES.Console.LoggerIniti: Logger's all set up with level: {levelName} ({level})
MALEFICAR_MANOEUVRES.Errors.LoggerFuncti: updateMaleficarLoggerLevel function's gone walkabout - module might not be fully loaded yet
MALEFICAR_MANOEUVRES.Errors.ExposeLog4Fo: Couldn't expose log4foundry globally - something's not right
MALEFICAR_MANOEUVRES.Errors.LoggerReinit: Failed to re-initialise logger - she's not playing ball
